Description:
Wood is currently recruiting for FWKO Instrument & Control Engineer to strengthen our team. This is B2B position on a 4/4 rotation in Iraq, with initial period being in Dubai.Experienced Instrument and Control Engineer with proven record of delivery in the Oil and Gas industry, particularly in Commissioning, Start Up and trouble shooting activities. Ability to provide continuous support to Operations team to optimize the plant.Must have strong experience in oil and gas industry i.e. 3 Phase Separation Facilities, Produced Water Facilities and Chemical Injection Facilities. Experience in Delta V (or similar) and in setting and control of Field Instrumentation is essential.Main DutiesCoordinate handover of the Instrument and Control systems from the Commissioning Team utilizing Go Completions.
Support the preparation of Start-up Procedures and Method statements
Oversee the Start Up of the new facilities from an Instrumentation and Control viewpoint.
Assist in the specification and ordering of Start-up and early Operations spares for Instruments and Controls.
Assist with on the job training requirement for Operators on the new facilities.
Support Operations of Instrumentation and Controls once new facilities reach “steady state” operations.
Raise and follow through on Engineering Queries as necessary during Start Up and Early operations of the facilities.
Coordinate with Maintenance Department on all requirements during early operations.
Prepare schedules for vendor attendance and preservation in accordance with the manufacturers requirements
Implement the ROO HSE Management System during all phases of the workQualification/SkillsBSc (or equivalent) in Control or Electrical Engineering preferable
Minimum of 10 year experience in Oil and Gas IndustryKnowledge, Skills and Experience:Demonstrable experience in similar role, with a proven background of delivery
Strong multidiscipline experience in O&G system commissioning, start-up and operations
Recognised O&G Instruments and Control start up background and very familiar with O&G Control Systems (particulary Delta V or equivalent) and Field Instrumentation
Experienced in planning and coordinating system start up activities
Experienced in working with multi-cultural personnel / team
Experienced in the development and coaching of team members
Ability to interface and interact with Operations Representatives at all levels
Delivery focused and committed to achievement of project goals
Confident and ability to work on own initiative
Desire to learn and develop not only self but others within team - good attitude to continuous improvement
Ability to demonstrate high level understanding of HSE safe working practices and procedures and their implementation
Ability to manage / maintain budget / schedule requirements
Fully conversant with the completions, commissioning and Start Up process
Ability to interpret project procedures, standards, specifications, and drawings including PFD's / P&ID's / SLD's / C&E's etc
IT literate in all major software packages (Word / Excel / PowerPoint etc)
Able to implement, manage and audit Permit to Work procedure and Isolation proceduresWood is a global leader in consulting and engineering, helping to unlock solutions to critical challenges in energy and materials markets.
